item.text: [1] On-site, on-prem (we come to you), here in San Diego County, CA, USA; *or*
[2] Remote support / tele-assistance service (via VNC, SSH, RDP, Windows Quick Assist, Windows Remote Assistance, Zoom, JitSi, TeamViewer, etc..). YOUR CHOICE! FREE ESTIMATES.

item.title: - Information Technology (I.T.):
item.text: Computer Consulting / Troubleshooting / Techno-Wizardry / Digital Evangelism;

item.title: - Operating Systems:
item.text: Linux core/server/GUI, Mint/LMDE4/cinnamon, Ubuntu; BSD/freebsd; RHEL/CentOS, SUSE, SELinux, Manjaro, *NIX; Windows Server, ActiveDirectory/AD/DS/DC, SSO, LDAP, OU, GPO/GPE, Event Viewer, syslog; Windows 10 Pro/Home/XP/8/7/Vista;

item.title: - Other:
item.text: Raspberry pi, python, bash/sh scripting, automation, convergence, migrations, optimization; Familiar: Arduino, NanoPi, AdaFruit, PocketBeagle, Banana Pi, Odroid; MacOS, JSON, Alexa/GoogleAssistant programming and WordPress (security/securing) and plug-ins;

item.title: - Virtualization::
item.text: Virtual Machines, VM, vmWare, vSphere, vCenter, Oracle VirtualBox, AWS/EC2, Google Cloud, Hyper-V/Azure, DigitalOcean, Apple Cloud;

item.title: - CyberSecurity:
item.text: System-Hardening, Ethical Hacking, Vulnerability Scans, Risk and Attack Surface Analysis, Security Audits; VLANs, IPv4 subnetting, sandboxing; Firewall/iptables/ufw/gufw;

item.title: - Networks & Networking:
item.text: Routers, Switches, Cisco iOS, Wi-Fi/wlan/SSID/mesh/ESS/Extended Service Set, NAS/SAN/RAID/SCSI/iSCSI, Spanned-Disks, Virtual Volumes, samba, Topology Analysis/SNMP/ICMP, Alerts/Notifications, Packet-Shaping, Prioritization, qos, VoIP, Route Optimization;

item.title: - Business Expediency and CRM:
item.text: Leveraging all your available tech, programming, features; empowering your business (or maximizing your home PC) to make the most of CRM; vTiger, SalesForce, NetSuite by Oracle, ZenDesk, SAP, HubSpot, SolarWinds, ServiceDesk, ServiceNOW, general cloud offerings, etc.
